FuncDef:
The least sfuboard command sets the minimum number of registered SFUs required on the device.
By default, a device requires three SFUs to be registered.

ParaDef.Info:
Board ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 32.

Examples: Enter system view, return user view with return command.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Using this command, you can set the number of the registered SFUs that the device requires by default. When the number of the SFUs is smaller than the default minimum number, the trap is generated.
